events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and the package still hasn't arrived. The tracking info hasn't updated for days.
System categorized the issue based on keywords 'tracking' and 'hasn’t arrived' under Delivery Delay.
The case was assigned to the delivery support team to investigate the delayed shipping status.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear your package hasn't arrived yet. I’m here to help you with this issue.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking information you have so I can check the shipment status?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the last tracking update was five days ago stating it was still in transit.
We have contacted the courier service and found the package was delayed due to weather. It should be delivered within 3 days.
Thank you for the update; I understand the delay and will wait for the delivery in the next few days.
Your issue is resolved as the package is now confirmed en route for delivery. Please reach out if it does not arrive soon.
Just checking in to confirm your package has arrived as expected. Please let us know if everything is fine.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience and please contact us again if you need further assistance.
